core

Class RadioBtn

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.CounterAction
      • core.RadioBtn

  • public class RadioBtn
extends CounterAction
    Popup an input dialog including (multiple) radio buttons and stores the input.
    Author:
    csiki

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private display.CloudCommentDisplay cloudCommentDisplay
      For displaying lower cloud.

      For displaying lower cloud.
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> options
      List of options (texts next to radio buttons) to be showed.
      private display.RadioBtnDialog radioBtnDialog
      Dialog box for showing the radio buttons and an Ok and a Cancel button.
      private int selectedIndex
      Index of the selected option (radio button).

    • Method Detail

      • addOption

        public void addOption(java.lang.String option)
        Adds an extra radio button. Call only before triggered!
        Parameters:
        option - text is shown next to the added radio button.

      • getSelectedText

        public java.lang.String getSelectedText()
        Gets the text of the selected radio button. Call only after triggered!
        Returns:
        text that is shown next to the selected radio button.

      • getSelectedIndex

        public int getSelectedIndex()
        Gets the index of the selected radio button. Index of the first added radio button is 0. Call only after triggered!
        Returns:
        index of the selected radio button (from 0 to [number of radio buttons added]-1).

      • trigger

        public void trigger()
        Shows window including the radio buttons for the user, waits till input is given.
        Specified by:
        trigger in class CounterAction
